questions: Are you a student currently pursuing technical education?
Do you have a Caste Certificate and an Income Certificate?
Are you a construction worker with a Construction Worker Registration Card?
Are you a former athlete with details of past achievements?
Have you lost a family member who was a Panchayat representative?

applicationProcedure: Visit the Official Website of the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Click on "Scheme Application" and select "Apply for Scheme"
Enter registration number and click "Show" to view details
Select the scheme, enter mandatory information and upload necessary documents
Click on "Submit Application" to complete the process
documents: Identity Proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
Identity Card of the Registered Worker

applicationProcedure: Farmers need to apply on the official portal.
First Farmers need to log in with their registration details.
If Farmers does have a registration number then they have to complete the registration process on https://dbtagriculture.bihar.gov.in/
After the registration, farmers can get/search for their Registration Number on https://pacsonline.bih.nic.in/fsy/Register.aspx
After login on Official Portal,  a new form will open.
Here applicants have to enter the required information.
And submit the application.
documents: Land Possession Certificate / Revenue Receipt of land should be after 31-03-2022.
Self-declaration certificate should be attested by ward member/farmer advisor.
The applicant applying should have a mobile number.

applicationProcedure: Open the official website
Select the register option
Read all the instructions carefully and move forward
Answer the 8 questions out of 10
Enter the details in the application form and click on the submit option
documents: Scanned Image of Aadhar card and Pan card
Caste certificate (Not required for general category)
Proof of entity (If the entity is registered)
Given format filled with details and signature

applicationProcedure: Download the application form from the official website
Fill in all the mandatory fields and attach copies of all the mandatory documents
Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to the District Public Relation Officer
documents: Photocopy of Registration Number of the Institution
Proof of Circulation for Media Organizations

applicationProcedure: Visit the Official Website of the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Click on "Scheme Application" and select "Apply for Scheme"
Enter registration number and click "Show" to view details
Select the scheme, enter mandatory information, and upload necessary documents
Click on "Submit Application" to complete the process
documents: Identity Proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
Identity Card of the Registered Worker

applicationProcedure: Visit the registration page of the DBT portal
Select Aadhaar verification type: OTP/ BIO-AUTH/ IRIS
Enter your Aadhaar number and Name as per Aadhaar
Enter the OTP
Confirm the details about the Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Details
Fill in all the details properly i.e. Farmer details, Land information, Bank account details
Validate with OTP
Visit the official website
Scroll to bottom and confirm the checkbox
Select the Type of Applicant and enter the DBT Registration Number of Kisan
Fill in the required details i.e. Address, Land Details, etc, and upload documents
Confirm the checkbox and then click on Submit
documents: Aadhaar Details (Should be linked with mobile number)

applicationProcedure: Submit an application on plain paper to the office of the Sub-Divisional Officer
documents: Identity proof of the deceased person
Death certificate of the deceased person
Proof of age of the deceased person
Below Poverty Line (BPL) Card/ Ration Card

applicationProcedure: Visit the Official Website of the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Click on Scheme Application and select Apply for Scheme
Enter your registration number and click Show to view your details
Select the scheme you intend to apply for, enter all mandatory information and upload the necessary documents in the specified format and size
Click on Submit Application to complete the process
documents: Identity Proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
Proof of age at the time of Registration
Identity Card of the Registered Worker

applicationProcedure: Visit the registration page of the DBT portal
Select Aadhaar verification type
Enter Aadhaar number and Name
Enter OTP and validate
Fill in farmer details, land information, and bank account details
Submit and generate Registration Id
Apply for the scheme using the 13 digit registration number
Visit the Official Website of the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Click on "Labour Registration"
Apply for New Registration
Enter Aadhar card number and name, then click "Authenticate"
Enter all required details and pay the application fee online
Visit the Official Website and click on "Scheme Application"
Select "Apply for Scheme" and enter registration number
Select the scheme, enter required information and upload necessary documents
Click on "Submit Application"
documents: Bank account details/copy of bank passbook

response.schemeName: Khule Jalsroto Mei Pen Aadharit Matsya Paalan ki Yojana
applicationProcedure: Visit the official website
Click on 'Applications are being invited for all the schemes of the financial year (2024-25), click here to apply'
Select 'Registration for Fisheries Schemes'
Complete basic details for registration
Enter a valid 10-digit mobile number and click to send OTP
Enter the OTP and receive a Registration Number and Password
Login with Registration Number and Password
Fill the application form
Upload required documents
Click on the submit button
documents: Photocopy of Photo Identity Card (Aadhaar/India Government recognized Photo Identity Card)
Original copy of Consent Letter (in prescribed form)
Self-attested Photocopy of Bank Passbook or Cheque (including bank name, branch name, account number, IFSC code)

applicationProcedure: Visit the registration page of the DBT portal
Select Aadhaar verification type
Enter Aadhaar number and Name
Enter OTP and validate
Fill in farmer details, land information, and bank account details
Submit and generate registration ID
Apply for the scheme after 48 hours using the registration number
documents: Land document or Land Possession Certificate
Details of Crop Damaged by the flood
Details of two adjacent farmers and verified documents

response.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Bagwani Mission: Kela Vikas Yojana
applicationProcedure: Visit the registration page of the DBT portal
Select Aadhaar verification type: OTP/ BIO-AUTH/ IRIS
Enter your Aadhaar number and Name as per Aadhaar
Enter the OTP
Confirm the details about the Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Details
Fill in all the details properly i.e. Farmer details, Land information, Bank account details
Validate with OTP
Visit the official website
Scroll to bottom and confirm the checkbox
Select the Type of Applicant and enter the DBT Registration Number of Kisan
Fill in the required details i.e. Address, Land Details, etc and upload documents
Confirm the checkbox and then click on Submit
Visit the Gram Panchayat office
Fill in the application form with the required personal and household details
Submit supporting documents
The application will be reviewed for eligibility
Upon approval, the household will be included in the piped water supply scheme
documents: Identity proof (Aadhaar card, Voter ID, etc)
Residential proof of the Gram Panchayat

applicationProcedure: Visit the official Website and click on the "Registration" button.
Enter your Mobile Number, New Password, Email, and Driving License No.
Click on "Register" to complete the registration process.
Login with your registered Mobile Number and Password.
On the Application page, fill in all the required details and upload the relevant documents.
Then click on the declaration form and click on "Submit".
Once all details are filled in correctly, click on "Print Application" to get a copy of the application form.
Visit the application page
Enter personal information and verify mobile number and Aadhaar number
Upload relevant documents
Read and agree to the declaration
Submit the application
documents: GST voucher of the motor pump

applicationProcedure: Visit the official website
Click on 'Applications are being invited for all the schemes of the financial year (2024-25), click here to apply'
Select 'Registration for Fisheries Schemes'
Complete basic details for registration
Enter a valid 10-digit mobile number and click to send OTP
Enter the OTP and receive a Registration Number and Password
Login with the Registration Number and Password
Fill the application form with personal details, permanent address, bank account details, land details, and financial availability of the scheme
Upload required documents
Click on the submit button
documents: Land ownership certificate/revenue receipt or lease agreement
Audit and income tax returns (for entrepreneurs)

response.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Vas Sthal Kray Sahayata Yojana
applicationProcedure: Verify your eligibility as a PMAY-G beneficiary.
Gather all required documents and submit your application through the designated Rural Development Department office.
The concerned authority will conduct a physical verification of landlessness and eligibility.
Upon approval, the amount will be directly transferred to the bank account.
documents: Identity proof (e.g., Aadhaar card, voter ID)
Proof of landlessness (certified by the concerned authority)

applicationProcedure: Visit the registration page
Provide required details for registration
Submit the registration form via mobile OTP
Login to the portal
Fill in the applicant details
Upload supporting documents
Submit the application

response.schemeName: Pathari Kshetr Talab Nirman Aadharit Matsya Paalan ki Yojana
applicationProcedure: Visit the official website
Click on 'Applications are being invited for all the schemes of the financial year (2024-25), click here to apply'
Select 'Registration for Fisheries Schemes'
Fill in basic details for registration
Login and fill the application form
Upload required documents
Submit the application form and print it
documents: Bank Branch Name, Account Number, IFSC code
Attested Copies of Aadhar Card/Ration Card/Voter ID Card
Land Ownership Certificate/Updated Revenue Receipt or Lease Agreement
Notarized Affidavit for land dispute-free status
